content: परिवृत् {c1c} <ab>A.</ab> {@--1@} To turn round, revolve; <ls>Ku. 1. 16.</ls> {@--2@} To roam about, move hither and thither. {@--3@} To change, barter, exchange. {@--4@} To turn back; <ls>R. 4. 72</ls>; <ls>V. 1. 17.</ls> {@--5@} To be, fall into; <ls>Māl. 9. 8.</ls> {@--6@} To decay, perish, disappear; <ls>Māl. 10. 6.</ls>
